theShadeThatFades:ShadePurge.NAME: Purge
theShadeThatFades:ShadePurge.DESCRIPTION: Set your theshadethatfades:Corruption to 0. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
theShadeThatFades:ShadePurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Set your theshadethatfades:Corruption to 0. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadows.NAME: Shadows
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadows.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. Shuffle a theshadethatfades:Fatigue into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. Shuffle a theshadethatfades:Fatigue into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeFatigue.NAME: Fatigue
theShadeThatFades:ShadeFatigue.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the start of your turn, if you have any theshadethatfades:Fatigues in hand, lose 1 energy (Doesn't stack).

theShadeThatFades:ShadeSpite.NAME: Spite
theShadeThatFades:ShadeSpite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Counts as a Curse during combat.

theShadeThatFades:ShadePursuit.NAME: Pursuit
theShadeThatFades:ShadePursuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Shuffle 3 Strikes into your draw pile.
theShadeThatFades:ShadePursuit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Shuffle 3 Upgraded Strikes into your draw pile.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeStrangle.NAME: Strangle
theShadeThatFades:ShadeStrangle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply 3 Constrict. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneLightning.NAME: Arcane Lightning
theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy !M! times.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadowStrike.NAME: Shadow Strike
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadowStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL This attack gets double the damage bonus from theshadethatfades:Corruption.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeMarkOfTheWitness.NAME: Mark of the Witness
theShadeThatFades:ShadeMarkOfTheWitness.DESCRIPTION: Apply theshadethatfades:Deteriorate to an enemy. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneFire.NAME: Arcane Fire
theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theshadethatfades:Burning to ANY target. NL Draw a card.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeFade.NAME: Fade
theShadeThatFades:ShadeFade.DESCRIPTION: If you have taken unblocked damage this turn, gain 1 Intangible.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeShroud.NAME: Shroud
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShroud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! theshadethatfades:Wither to ANY target.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeExert.NAME: Exert
theShadeThatFades:ShadeExert.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a random Curse into your draw pile.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeForbiddenThoughts.NAME: Forbidden Thoughts
theShadeThatFades:ShadeForbiddenThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Place Shame on top of your draw pile.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeDusk.NAME: Dusk
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDusk.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 theshadethatfades:Shadows into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDusk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 upgraded theshadethatfades:Shadows into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeEncroachingShadow.NAME: Encroaching Shadows
theShadeThatFades:ShadeEncroachingShadow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 1 theshadethatfades:Corruption.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeEncroachingShadow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, gain 1 theshadethatfades:Corruption.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeVesselOfSuffering.NAME: Vessel of Suffering
theShadeThatFades:ShadeVesselOfSuffering.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage during your turn, gain 1 [E].
theShadeThatFades:ShadeVesselOfSuffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage, gain 1 [E].

theShadeThatFades:ShadeSchadenfreude.NAME: Schadenfreude
theShadeThatFades:ShadeSchadenfreude.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadePossession.NAME: Possession
theShadeThatFades:ShadePossession.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain 1 Intangible.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeEidolonForm.NAME: Eidolon Form
theShadeThatFades:ShadeEidolonForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust your hand. NL Gain 1 Intangible for every 5 cards Exhausted. NL Grave.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeEidolonForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust your hand. NL Gain 1 Intangible for every 5 cards Exhausted.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeEidolonFormInfini.NAME: Eidolon Form
theShadeThatFades:ShadeEidolonFormInfini.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, transform cards in your hand into random Black Cards. NL Grave.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeEidolonFormInfini.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, transform cards in your hand into random Black Cards.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeDefile.NAME: Defile
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDefile.DESCRIPTION: Transform every card in your hand into a random Curse. Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies for each one.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeBlackLightning.NAME: Black Lightning
theShadeThatFades:ShadeBlackLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy for each Curse in your draw pile.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeBlackLightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL (You have !M! Curses in your draw pile.)

theShadeThatFades:ShadeScourge.NAME: Scourge
theShadeThatFades:ShadeScourge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Trigger any start-of-turn and end-of-turn effects on the target.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeScourge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Trigger any start-of-turn and end-of-turn effects on the target twice.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeFalteringBlade.NAME: Faltering Blade
theShadeThatFades:ShadeFalteringBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Deal 2 less damage for each stack of theshadethatfades:Corruption on you.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeRebuff.NAME: Rebuff
theShadeThatFades:ShadeRebuff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy. NL Lose !M! stacks of theshadethatfades:Corruption.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeWitchFire.NAME: Witch Fire
theShadeThatFades:ShadeWitchFire.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 theshadethatfades:Burning and 2 theshadethatfades:Wither to ANY target.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeWitchFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 theshadethatfades:Burning and 2 theshadethatfades:Wither to ALL enemies.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeWrithingFlame.NAME: Writhing Flame
theShadeThatFades:ShadeWrithingFlame.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 4 theshadethatfades:Burning to the attacker.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeFeint.NAME: Feint
theShadeThatFades:ShadeFeint.DESCRIPTION: Force an enemy that intends to attack to attack, and apply !M! Vulnerable to them. NL Draw a card.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeFeint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: That enemy does not intend to attack!

theShadeThatFades:ShadeAnoint.NAME: Anoint
theShadeThatFades:ShadeAnoint.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. Give it a copy of your theshadethatfades:Corruption. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeHaunt.NAME: Haunt
theShadeThatFades:ShadeHaunt.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. At the start of its turns, it is theshadethatfades:Shackled for !M!. Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeDeception.NAME: Deception
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDeception.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your theshadethatfades:Corruption, plus !B!.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeBlackHeart.NAME: Black Heart
theShadeThatFades:ShadeBlackHeart.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theshadethatfades:Corruption X times. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeShatter.NAME: Shatter
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShatter.DESCRIPTION: The next attack you play deals additional damage equal to twice the target's Block.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next attack you play deals additional damage equal to three times the target's Block.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeForbiddenKnowledg.NAME: Forbidden Knowledge
theShadeThatFades:ShadeForbiddenKnowledg.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each Curse in your draw pile.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeForbiddenKnowledg.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL (You have !M! Curses in your draw pile.)

theShadeThatFades:ShadeRemission.NAME: Remission
theShadeThatFades:ShadeRemission.DESCRIPTION: Set your theshadethatfades:Corruption to 0. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadeDance.NAME: Shade-dance
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadeDance.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Intangible to EVERYONE. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeSpreadingCorrupti.NAME: Spreading Corruption
theShadeThatFades:ShadeSpreadingCorrupti.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each of your turns, apply theshadethatfades:Deteriorate to all enemies that are not Deteriorating.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeDistortion.NAME: Distortion
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDistortion.DESCRIPTION: Curses are playable. Whenever you play a Curse, gain 1 energy.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDistortion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, transform it into a random Black Card.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeProlongedSufferin.NAME: Prolonged Suffering
theShadeThatFades:ShadeProlongedSufferin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, apply !M! theshadethatfades:Wither.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeOverdrive.NAME: Overdrive
theShadeThatFades:ShadeOverdrive.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain theshadethatfades:Corruption, gain twice as much.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeChaosStorm.NAME: Chaos Storm
theShadeThatFades:ShadeChaosStorm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, randomly apply 3 theshadethatfades:Corruption, 2 theshadethatfades:Wither, or 4 theshadethatfades:Burning, or deal 6 damage, to a random enemy.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeChaosStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, randomly apply 3 theshadethatfades:Corruption, 2 theshadethatfades:Wither, or 4 theshadethatfades:Burning, or deal 6 damage, to each enemy.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeDefenseAgainstThe.NAME: Defense vs. Dark Arts
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDefenseAgainstThe.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add an Ethereal theshadethatfades:Rebuff to your hand.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDefenseAgainstThe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add an upgraded Ethereal theshadethatfades:Rebuff to your hand.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeMidnightHorizon.NAME: Midnight Horizon
theShadeThatFades:ShadeMidnightHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is replayed against each other enemy.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeExecute.NAME: Execute
theShadeThatFades:ShadeExecute.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played !M! additional times if that would kill the target.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeExecute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played !M! additional times if that would kill the target.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeOblivion.NAME: Oblivion
theShadeThatFades:ShadeOblivion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! random Curses into your draw pile.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeMutualAnnihilatio.NAME: Mutual Annihilation
theShadeThatFades:ShadeMutualAnnihilatio.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If you have taken unblocked damage 13 times this combat, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneTempest.NAME: Arcane Tempest
theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneTempest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneTempest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X + 1 times.

theShadeThatFades:ShadePureStrike.NAME: Pure Strike
theShadeThatFades:ShadePureStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have 0 theshadethatfades:Corruption. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
theShadeThatFades:ShadePureStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I cannot play that card while I have Corruption!

theShadeThatFades:ShadeFexnil.NAME: Fexnil
theShadeThatFades:ShadeFexnil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the leftmost enemy, then do it again to each consecutive enemy, doubling the damage each time.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneInferno.NAME: Arcane Inferno
theShadeThatFades:ShadeArcaneInferno.DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 theshadethatfades:Burning to EVERYONE, !M! times. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeDeathSentence.NAME: Death Sentence
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDeathSentence.DESCRIPTION: Apply theshadethatfades:Deteriorate and 99 theshadethatfades:Wither to ANY target. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeSubversion.NAME: Subversion
theShadeThatFades:ShadeSubversion.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. During your turn, all damage they take is converted into healing. During enemy turn, all healing they receive is converted into damage. Lasts for 1 round. NL Exhaust.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeSubversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. During your turn, all damage they take is converted into healing. During enemy turn, all healing they receive is converted into damage. Lasts for 2 rounds. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeEthericShift.NAME: Etheric Shift
theShadeThatFades:ShadeEthericShift.DESCRIPTION: Make all cards in your hand Ethereal, and reduce their cost by !M!, until the end of the turn.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadowBarrier.NAME: Shadow Barrier
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadowBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your theshadethatfades:Corruption. NL Set your theshadethatfades:Corruption to 0. At the start of your next turn, gain it all back.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeElixirOfNoctis.NAME: Elixir of Noctis
theShadeThatFades:ShadeElixirOfNoctis.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. Put them to sleep for !M! turns. While they sleep, at the end of your turn, they recover 30 HP. NL Exhaust.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeElixirOfNoctis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. Put them to sleep for !M! turns. While they sleep, at the end of your turn, they recover 50 HP. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeApexCorruption.NAME: Apex Corruption
theShadeThatFades:ShadeApexCorruption.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each stack of theshadethatfades:Corruption you have. NL Gain 3 energy, and draw 3 extra cards, each turn. NL You can no longer gain or lose theshadethatfades:Corruption. NL Exhaust.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeApexCorruption.MOD_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each stack of theshadethatfades:Corruption you have. NL Transform all your cards into upgraded Black Cards. NL You can no longer gain or lose theshadethatfades:Corruption. NL Exhaust.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadowBlend.NAME: Shadow Blend
theShadeThatFades:ShadeShadowBlend.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn 3 turns from now, replay all cards you played between now and then with the same targets.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeAmalgamForm.NAME: Amalgam Form
theShadeThatFades:ShadeAmalgamForm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, gain block equal to your theshadethatfades:Corruption. You can no longer become Intangible.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeBlightBolt.NAME: Blight Bolt
theShadeThatFades:ShadeBlightBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a debuffed enemy. Reduce their debuffs by 1.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeUnveil.NAME: Unveil
theShadeThatFades:ShadeUnveil.DESCRIPTION: Transform a card in your hand into a random Curse. NL Gain !B! block.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeUnveilInfinite.NAME: Unveil
theShadeThatFades:ShadeUnveilInfinite.DESCRIPTION: Transform a card in your hand into a random Black Card. NL At the end of your turn, transform it back.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeUnveilInfinite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform a card in your hand into a random Black Card. NL At the end of your turn, transform it back. NL Repeatable.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeConflagration.NAME: Conflagration
theShadeThatFades:ShadeConflagration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, if you are not Intangible, apply !M! Burning to ALL enemies.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeConflagration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, if you are not Intangible, apply !M! Burning to ALL enemies.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeVoodooDoll.NAME: Soul Bind
theShadeThatFades:ShadeVoodooDoll.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. NL Summon a doll with HP equal to half of theirs. NL Any damage or healing done to the doll also affects the enemy.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeVoodooDoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. NL Summon a doll with HP equal to 75% of theirs. NL Any damage or healing done to the doll also affects the enemy.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeInfusion.NAME: Infusion
theShadeThatFades:ShadeInfusion.DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. During the next enemy turn, they receive double damage and healing from all sources.
theShadeThatFades:ShadeInfusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose ANY target. During the next enemy turn, they receive triple damage and healing from all sources.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeGrudge.NAME: Grudge
theShadeThatFades:ShadeGrudge.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a copy of your draw pile into your discard pile.

theShadeThatFades:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theShadeThatFades:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theShadeThatFades:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theShadeThatFades:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theShadeThatFades:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theShadeThatFades:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theShadeThatFades:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theShadeThatFades:DefaultAttackWithVaria.NAME: Special Strike
theShadeThatFades:DefaultAttackWithVaria.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theShadeThatFades:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theShadeThatFades:DefaultSecondMagicNumb.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theShadeThatFades:DefaultSecondMagicNumb.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theShadeThatFades:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theShadeThatFades:ShadeDestructivore.NAME: Siphon Strength
theShadeThatFades:ShadeDestructivore.DESCRIPTION: Steal an enemy's Strength (minimum 2) until the end of their turn.
